flash_drv.s90 File Reference

Driver routines to read (no write) datas stored in AVRMega flash These routines can be stored and executed in all flash space. More...

Defines

#define ENABLE_BIT_DEFINITIONS

Detailed Description

Driver routines to read (no write) datas stored in AVRMega flash These routines can be stored and executed in all flash space.

  • Compiler: IAR EWAVR for AVR
  • Supported devices: All AVRMega devices

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/
